Control Name: SEC 9.3 Automate detection of unintended data access
Control Statement: Use tools such as GuardDuty to automatically detect attempts to move data outside of deﬁned boundaries based on data classiﬁcation level, for example, to detect a trojan that is copying data to an unknown or untrusted network using the DNS protocol.

control_attributes.Control: SEC 9.3 Automate detection of unintended data access
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you protect your data in transit?
